data.name: Dungeons & Dragons: Dark Alliance Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The music of Dark Alliance brings to life the frigid north of Icewind Dale and its iconic characters and creatures. This soundtrack, composed by Vibe Avenue, contains 28 fully orchestrated songs in the world of Dungeons & Dragons.

This is a lovingly crafted exploration of the varied cultures that you will run into, including goblins, verbeeg, frost giants, cultists, and duergar. It makes the perfect musical package for Dark Alliance fans and Dungeons & Dragons fans. It may even inspire a few dungeon masters...
data.about_the_game:
The music of Dark Alliance brings to life the frigid north of Icewind Dale and its iconic characters and creatures. This soundtrack, composed by Vibe Avenue, contains 28 fully orchestrated songs in the world of Dungeons & Dragons.

This is a lovingly crafted exploration of the varied cultures that you will run into, including goblins, verbeeg, frost giants, cultists, and duergar. It makes the perfect musical package for Dark Alliance fans and Dungeons & Dragons fans. It may even inspire a few dungeon masters...
data.short_description: Does not include the Dark Alliance base game. This fully orchestrated soundtrack contains 28 songs, all lovingly composed by Vibe Avenue.
